name: Air Marion, Inc.
about: Air Marion, Inc. is a reputable flying school located at the Marion Airport, offering a range of aviation training programs. We provide a Discovery Flight, a 20-25 minute introductory flight for up to three people, which is an excellent way to experience flying and determine if becoming a pilot is right for you. Our programs are designed to be engaging and informative, with a focus on safety and professional instruction. Whether you are looking to start a career in aviation or simply want to enjoy the thrill of flying, Air Marion, Inc. is committed to providing a high-quality learning experience. Our certified flight instructors and well-maintained aircraft ensure that you receive the best possible training. Join us to take the first step in your aviation journey.
services:
["Ground School
Intro Flight
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
